I had a long career as an educator and mentor, but now I am retired and enjoying my golden years.
I love Asian food, especially spicy Thai food.
i love to cut down trees.

i have three children.
I enjoy writing my dreams down because they often tell me a lot about myself.
i work for peta.
i m going back to school.

content.text: Hello! I am doing well, thank you. How are you?

I am doing well, thank you. I am a retired educator and mentor. I have a dog, and I like to walk him and listen to music about animals when I do. I would like to learn how to train my dog to behave better. What do you like to do?

I used to be very outgoing, but now I prefer to keep to myself. I have three children. I enjoy writing my dreams down because they often tell me a lot about myself. I work for PETA, and I am going back to school.
That is interesting that you used to be outgoing but now prefer to keep to yourself. What made you change?
I think it was a combination of things. I got older, I had children, and I just became more introverted. I still enjoy being around people, but I need my alone time too.
I understand. I am also an introvert, so I need my alone time as well. It sounds like you have a lot going on in your life. How do you balance everything?
It can be challenging, but I try to stay organized and focused. I make sure to set aside time for each of my activities, and I try not to overcommit myself.
That sounds like a good plan. I am sure you are a great mom. What do you like most about your job?
I love working for PETA because I believe in their mission to protect animals. I am also passionate about writing, so I enjoy getting to write about my dreams and other experiences.
That is wonderful. I am sure you are making a difference in the world.
I hope so. I am just trying to do my part.
I am sure you are. It was nice talking to you. Have a good day!
